attributes.action: Make the 22nd of June a Bank Holiday so everyone can get leathered on the 21st.
attributes.additional_details: The sick pay at all these struggling companies is going to be through the roof otherwise.
attributes.background: With lockdown potentially completely lifting on the 21st of June I’d like to see everyone get a day off graft on the 22nd to recover from the naughty session the day before. Could even consider the 23rd as a day off too, for the more severe hangovers.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510
